lenders.name: Guigo
lenders.loan_because: I think i can help and i believe this money will be well used.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for companies creating ads, commercials and more for their products.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in a nation where hard work has allowed me a chance at success.  I realize that my success came in part because I was able to receive modest loans from my government and loans from some family members; these loans were used to invest in my education and business ideas.  Without such loans to give me a chance to succeed, it is likely that I would not be where I am today.    I feel that many people throughout the world are in a state that I was in twenty years ago: they are hard conscientious workers who wish to improve themselves and their lives, but they just need a loan to help get them started.  Kiva seems a perfect avenue for me to help these people in their journey towards success.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to write computer software and design systems that allow wireless phones to be used to provide data services (such as access to the internet).

lenders.name: Norbert & Ruth
lenders.loan_because: This is the way the world ought to work.

We need US$ 65,000 to create more 20 classromm.

lenders.name: Linden and advisees
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate all my life--good friends, a healthy family, opportunity for the education I wanted, and, now, work that rewards me every day.  Participating in Kiva loans will help people who were born into less easy circumstances--which only seems fair to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students find a way to learn about themselves, others, other times, and other circumstances through the resources our library offers them. lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
At birth I was randomly dealt a pretty nice hand of cards purely by virtue of my random assignment of parents and birthplace.  The least I should be able to do is lend a hand to folks who may not have been as randomly lucky.  

Helping enable others to improve their circumstances makes a small contribution towards raising the "tide" that lifts all "boats."  That is, it contributes to the betterment of global society as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: The Market Intelligence function provides business leaders with the perspective and insights they need in order to better understand their market environment and more confidently make the business decisions which will permit their enterprise to prosper.

lenders.name: Debra Jo
lenders.loan_because: It's not all about me. Because it is a way to see unity not segregation. Because I have been helped before and it can make a difference. Because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I tattoo eyebrows or eye color or lip color on your face so it is permanently there. Sometimes I do this and make it look nature. If your face is different because of an accident and now your lips are not straight we can make them appear that way with skin tone colors.  It is called corrective pigment camouflage, CPM, and you can use this technique if you have survived being burned or if you have Vitaligo, or alopecia. (Genetic hypo-pigmentation or hair loss diseases.)  It can give continuity to skin and appearances. I also work with scars and many other traits. The work is SO rewarding. All I do is tattoo the outside and I get to be a piece of watching the inside heal! What a great position to be in. I wouldn't do anything else!

lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to "spread the wealth" and give people equal opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean people's teeth mainly but , I also educate them as to how to clean their teeth at home.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: Development begins neither with "big business" nor with "aid" to corrupt governments, but with small entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Melanie and Sammy
lenders.loan_because: What a difference we can make, one dollar at a time, helping other families.
